attributes.action: Call a general election immediately, let the British Public decide.
attributes.background: The British Public must now decide the future direction of the government. Too much has changed in regards to policy, leadership and direction since the last election. Why should so few people have a say in how the county is run. We, the public want a general election now.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
